game.name: Overcooked! All You Can Eat
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Overcooked! 1과 2에서 60FPS의 부드러움을 4k 화질로 양파 왕국에서 제공하는 모든 걸 경험하세요. 처음부터 다시 새롭게 시작해보세요. 200개 이상(22개 추가)의 레벨과 80명 이상(3명 추가)의 요리사와 함께 경험할 수 있는 궁극의 Overcooked! 입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Experience all the Onion Kingdom has to offer, Overcooked! 1 & 2 infused with 4k goodness running at a smooth 60 FPS. Fully remastered and cooked up from scratch. Enjoy 200+ levels (22 new) and 80+ chefs (3 new), this is the ultimate Overcooked! experience.

reviewHighlights.text: I bought this a long time ago hoping I could play it with my ex girlfriend, we played Overcooked 2 and we had tons of fun, no arguing, simply good coo...
I played this in a different platform, it's been years and you still couldn't fix the online server connection issues with this game? It takes us hour...
